body.p:
BowlingGreen Ky
May 24/62
To His Excellency
B Magoffin Esqr

Robt R Harrison some time since was arrested and Commited to Jail in this county under a charge of murdering William A White of this county -- On the night of the 22nd Inst said Harrison escaped from said Jail & has not been since heard of -- By a statement in such case provided it is my duty as Judge of the County Court of Warren County to advise you of the fact & to petition your to issue your proclamation in the premises which I hope you will do forthwith -- My information is that the murder was an aggravated case --

I have the honor of being your frd & obt servt &C
W H Payne
P. S. The description of said Harrsion is as follows --
About 5ft 10 Inches high heavy set Hair dark sandy. age between 25 & 30 years -- a scar on one cheek bone, speaks distinctly & slowly, rather round shouldered -- stout healthy looking man

Warren Co
Reward for R. R. Harrison
Murder
Issd May 28 1862
